column1:
.clearfix:after {
		visibility: hidden;
		display: block;
		font-size: 0;
		content: "" "";
		clear: both;
		height: 0;
	}
	.clearfix { display: inline-block; }
	/* start commented backslash hack \*/
	* html .clearfix { height: 1%; }
	.clearfix { display: block; }
	/* close commented backslash hack */
